text: is a railway station operated by Kurobe Gorge Railway in Kurobe, Toyama Prefecture, Japan. == Station overview == Entrance to platforms Kanetsuri Station is a manned station and has two side platforms. The station serves Kanetsuri Onsen, which features a public outdoor onsen and a ryokan. == Adjacent stations == ==References== ==External links== * Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1953 Category:Railway stations in Toyama Prefecture
title: Kanetsuri Station
